| History                 = Ninja USA was a competition where contestants raced through an obstacle course. The conestants with the lowest completion time advanced to the following round. [[Miguel O'Hara (Earth-928)|Miguel O'Hara]] competed and got the lowest time on the entry level course in the history of the show. He was scheduled to go onto the next round in [[Wikipedia:Mount Yakushi|Mount Yakushi]], [[Japan]], but forgot about the show after surviving a terrorist attack from the [[Fist (Earth-616)|First]].{{r|Spider-Man 2099 Vol 3 1}}

| Trivia                  = * Ninja USA is a reference to ''[[wikipedia:American Ninja Warrior|American Ninja Warrior]]''. The contestants are even called Ninja Warriors.{{r|Spider-Man 2099 Vol 3 1}}
